CustomField.formula:
IF( TEXT(Type) = "End User Customer", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0151I0000067cmb&oid=00DfY000000FYxR&lastMod=1658351185000", "Customer"), IF( TEXT(Type) = "Customer", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0151I0000067cmb&oid=00DfY000000FYxR&lastMod=1658351185000", "Customer"), IF( TEXT(Type) = "Partner", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0151I0000067cnA&oid=00DfY000000FYxR&lastMod=1658351860000", "Partner"), IF( TEXT(Type) = "Prospect", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0158W00000CqAUs&oid=00DfY000000FYxR&lastMod=1658351210000", "Prospect"), IF( TEXT(Type) = "Churn" , IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0158W00000CqAUx&oid=00DfY000000FYxR&lastMod=1657643576000", "Churned"), IF( TEXT(Type) = "Paused" , IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0158W00000CqB9g&oid=00DfY000000FYxR&lastMod=1658412612000", "Paused"),
IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Distributor", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0151I0000067cmg&oid=00DfY000000FYxR&lastMod=1658351693000", "Distributor"), IF( RecordTypeId = "0121I000000WOQw", IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0151I0000067cn5&oid=00DfY000000FYxR&lastMod=1568818823000", "Distributor Partner"),
NULL))))))))
CustomField.label: Banner
